== Ian Whitfield ==
Hi, I'm an Ubuntu kernel engineer at Canonical. I'm working on the Google Cloud Ubuntu kernel releases and have a strong interest in quality control and reducing software complexity. I joined Canonical in August of 2024.

Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/~ijwhitfield <<BR>>
